text: Hasan Kemal Özdemir (born 9 February 1964) is a retired Turkish football defender. He was capped three times for Turkey, and was also a squad member at the 1983 Mediterranean Games. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Turkey international footballers Category:Fenerbahçe S.K. footballers Category:Sakaryaspor footballers Category:Adana Demirspor footballers Category:Alanyaspor footballers Category:Fenerbahçe football coaches Category:Competitors at the 1983 Mediterranean Games Category:Mediterranean Games silver medalists for Turkey Category:Turkish football managers
title: Hasan Özdemir (footballer)
